title: agent-narrative: Create prompt templates and character profiles

dispatched_by: mayor

Create narrative system with prompt templates and character profiles. Design dynamic start scenarios (The Age of AI: 2026 setting). Build NPC profiles with personalities, dialogue trees, and relationship tracking. Create prompt templates for: scenario generation, NPC responses, narrative outcomes. All prompts should interface with llm_provider.py.

title: CLAUDE.md: Architecture & State-Management Guide
description: Draft comprehensive CLAUDE.md documenting: (1) Project folder structure, (2) GameState state-machine logic with hard-coded math (bank, market, energy), (3) Turn loop architecture (Market Phase → Action Phase → Narrative Outcome), (4) Agent interface contracts for engine/llm/narrative modules, (5) Ollama integration patterns with gpt-oss-20b. This is the foundational spec all polecats must follow.

title: agent-llm: Build OllamaClient with error handling (llm_provider.py)
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Build OllamaClient in llm_provider.py using ollama Python library. Interface with gpt-oss-20b for NPC dialogue and dynamic scenario generation. Must include robust error handling: connection failures, model not found, timeout retries, fallback behaviors. Abstract the LLM so engine.py calls it without knowing implementation details.

title: agent-engine: Build GameState manager and turn logic (engine.py)
description:
attached_args: Implement engine.py following CLAUDE.md spec. Build GameState dataclass, turn loop, hard-coded math.
dispatched_by: mayor

Build the core game engine in engine.py: GameState class with hard-coded mathematical rules for bank account fluctuations, market shift calculations, energy depletion/regeneration. Implement turn loop: Market Phase (calculate market events), Action Phase (player coding/work actions), Narrative Outcome Phase. State must be unhackable by LLM - all math in Python, no LLM interference on core logic.
